prompts: Create a cute bat-like Pokemon that can fly and has a blue body with fluffy features.
Imagine a psychic-type Pokemon with a unique shape, featuring large ears and a friendly demeanor.
Generate a small, winged Pokemon resembling a bat, with a color palette of light blue and gray.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon with big ears and a round body, perfect for a forest habitat.
Design a playful Pokemon that uses echolocation, featuring a fluffy texture and large expressive eyes.
Make a creature that embodies both flying and psychic types, with a color scheme of icy blue.
I want to see a Pokemon that thrives in caves, with distinct bat-like wings and an adorable face.
